comment.author: 42174004@N05
comment._content: To stick photo to frame is simple, use double sided tape, but how to avoid the tape to yellowing after long time?I suggest 3M tape Printer-friendly format Scotch® Photo and Document Tape Scotch® Acid-Free Products. Mount or repair your creative work safely! Designed for mounting and repairing photos, artwork, momentos, prints and other documents. Totally acid-free, water-based adhesive. Make a Selection Scotch® Acid-Free Photo & Document Tape 001, 3/4 in x 400 in Roll in Dispenser Mending Tape for photo and documents. This totally acid-free tape is perfect for mending and repairing pictures, documents and memorabilia. Independently laboratory-tested to be safe for use on photos. Scotch® Acid-Free Photo & Document Tape 002, double-stick, 1/2 in x 300 in Roll in Dispenser Mounting tape for photos and documents. This totally acid-free, double-stick tape is perfect for mounting pictures, documents and memorabilia. Independently laboratory-tested to be safe for use on photos.
